title: Facing facts
creator_credit: Barrie Smith, Peter Dimond and Supreme Sound Studios
brief_description: The death of a close friend affects Glen Turner so much that he reflects on how his own death would affect his family’s financial security. In a discussion with an Officer of a Trustee company he learns of the steps he can take to alleviate any hardship in the event of unexpected tragedy.
